I think a Pulsefire {{champion:81}} chroma pack would be amazing with different coloured particles. PF EZ has been picked up by a lot of players, and also people are annoyed that most of the skins are splashed and there is no new effects to the particle animations. PF Ez Red, Blue, Green (kinda like Green Lantern) can be used to give off a superhero vibe just like what the PF skin is supposed to offer.
